Posts.Content: Momof4blessings wrote: Hi- i am 26 years old- mother of 4 young children. I noticed a lump a couple months ago and decided to get it checked out. The dr said its probably fibroadenomas and I needed an ultrasound and come back in 4 weeks to check and see if its grown. I had the ultrasound and they said it looked like fibroadenomas. Then my dr called later and said that I need to set up a biopsy because the ultrasound had abnormalities- but that was all they knew. Has anyone experienced anything like this? I don't know what to think- it sounds like ultrasounds are pretty good at detecting fibroadenomas so I am afraid that it is cancer but can't get in for my biopsy till next week! Any info is helpful! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Abnormal ultrasound Momof4blessings faerie1111

Posts.Content: Momof4blessings wrote: So I posted earlier this week about my "abnormal ultrasound" and I was misinformed and was told that I would have a biopsy on Tuesday well after waiting 20 minutes on hold I was told it was just a consultation- the radiologist and my obgyn thinks its fibrodanamos- and I was told to come back in in 4 weeks the. After the ultrasound they said I needed a biopsy. I was given no number but one of the nurses said "please don't worry it's fibrodanamos and those are benign" I wanted to say "you don't know that for sure!" But I was just curious how soon after consultations the biopsy would be? And so I'm waiting a week for my "consultation" and then they called yesterday (on a Saturday) left a message saying that they needed to change my appointment to Wednesday!!! I am just feeling so alone and scared. I know God is in control- and I am praying that he will use me to bring Him glory no matter what the outcome...but I feel like everyone already thinks I'm dying and talks about me like I'm not there- and everyone is like "tell then you can't go Wednesday and you have to go Tuesday" and that's not how drs do things--- Ugghh I just hate waiting! I am definitely praying for everyone who deals with waiting and/or dealing with breast cancer Dailey! I am ashamed I haven't before this! Any feedback would be great! Thanks! Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: So frustrated! Momof4blessings Momof4blessings

Posts.Content: Momof4blessings wrote: my biopsy for my probably fibroadenoma is on Friday - I'm feeling so anxious! I just wish I knew why the breast specialist would say " it's definitely not cancer" and then 4 months later decide I need a biopsy. And to top it all off I'm having terrible morning sickness- that'll be fun during the biopsy! Everyone I talk to says " oh yore fine" and acts like I'm so silly to be worried at all and even though they are probably right, it doesn't help me.. Just feeling anxious tonight :( Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Feeling anxious Momof4blessings Momof4blessings
